name: 90s Character IDs Part 2 Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Now and Then.

	Demi Moore starred as the adult Samantha and Gaby Hoffman starred as the teenage Samantha in this 1995 flick. This film is about four friends who reunite for the birth of a baby and try and come to terms with their lives.  The cast also included Thora Birch, Melanie Griffith, Christina Ricci, Rosie O'Donnell, and Rita Wilson.

Sleeping with the Enemy.

	Patrick Bergin starred as this crazy husband who searchs for his wife who has faked her own death to escape his abuse.  Julia Roberts and Kevin Anderson also star in this 1991 thriller.

Analyze This.

	Lisa Kudrow co-stars with Billy Crystal and Robert DeNiro in this comedy story of a mob boss who gets relieved of stress by talking to a shrink played by Crystal.

American Pie.

	Chris Owen was "The Shermanator" in this 1999 gross out comedy.  He was also cast in "She's All That" as the guy who had to eat his own pubic hair off of a pizza.

options: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
questions.explanation:
The Wedding Singer.

	Adam Sandler starred in this comedy from 1998 about the 1980s as a guy who gets dumped at the altar and then falls in love with a waitress played by Drew Barrymore.

The Cable Guy.

	Matthew Broderick was this character along side Jim Carrey in this extremely dark comedy from 1996 about a cable guy who becomes obsessed with his clients.

Reality Bites.

	Ben Stiller had a small role as Winona Ryder's brief boyfriend in this story about a group of kids who try to make it in life after college.

Dick.

	Kirsten Dunst played this high schooler in 1999.  She along with Michelle Williams played a couple of teenagers who unknownly expose Nixon and the Watergate scandal.

Sleepers.

	Brad Pitt and Brad Renfro played the adult and teenage role in this film from 1996.  It is about a group of young men who plan revenge against a gang of prison guards who brutalized them when they were in a detention center when they were teenagers.

From Dusk Til Dawn.

	Harvey Keitel starred in this horror flick from 1996 about a man and his two children who get kidnapped by robbers and taken to a bar full of vampires.
